rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment contains reassuring language ('strongest AI surveillance program') but no high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
'will not enter' is a Reassuring cue (Q5). 'strongest' describes a program, not the impact of the threat.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The phrase 'will not enter the food system' is a bare negation and 'strongest AI surveillance program in the world' is a superlative boast, neither are explicit calming cues per Q5 rules.
The segment uses 'not enter the food system' and 'strongest AI surveillance program' which are food safety/confidence cues, not minimiser + scale contrast.
